mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_os_stats (short_uri, cnt, os, access_date, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{et.shortUri}, 1, #{et.os}, #{et.accessDate}, #{et.createTime}, #{et.updateTime}, #{et.delFlag}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + 1, update_time = #{et.updateTime};
mapper.select: SELECT os, SUM(cnt) as cnt FROM t_link_os_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUri} GROUP BY os
